page.title: 10Wetwang,Facilities.
page.content:
There is a{doctor's surgery}in Wetwang.This is a group practice and the doctors are Doctor Fowler,Doctor Clark,Doctor Crawford and Doctor Gauntlett.The surgery is in Doctor Fowler's house in Main Street.There is a surgery every day except Thursday and Sunday.The doctors also act as dispensers and so you can get your medecine from them when you visit the surgery instead of having to go to Driffield to a chemist.
In the village there is a {policeman's}house.This is between Main Street and York Road.You can recognise it by the blue sign at the door.We have a policeman called P.C.Noble and if you have a problem like a lost pet he will help you.If there is an emergency then you are transferred to Driffield or Beverley.
